list_ex_of_english: In an ideal world, most people would prefer gourmet cuisine, but it is costly and difficult to prepare.

She should be even more familiar with the old cuisine adage that too many cooks spoil the broth.
So, alien cuisine would be a purpose for human intelligence, but not its purpose in the relevant sense.
Despite its attempts, the modernizing state never managed to impose a national seafood cuisine.
